</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 98 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
champion's aura

**Requirements**
champion’s aura

</column>

---

Your aura protects against the power of the Void. You and all allies in your champion's aura gain resistance 5 to void damage and a +1 status bonus to saves against [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510) effects.
